description: Root rule must be of root type.
_operator_comment: logic operator for children. 1: and, 2: or
_filterType_comment: 1: filter out logs matching this rule, 2: filter in

children._enabled_comment: this rule will not add to root if not enabled
children._reverse_comment: If reverse set to true, this rule match match log not between [start, end].
If reverse set to true, this rule will match logs not containing any of the words.
